reviewText: After watching this wonderful film, I understand the importance of protecting our environment. It is like taking a trip to the deepest and mysterious forests in Venezuela. Beautifully shot, in this documentary you can see amazing tepuys, pristine water courses and exotic vegetation in ancient lands where few people have ever been. Thumbs up!,

"Deep into Canaima" is a beautifully shot film about a thrilling scientific expedition into the oldest known lands in the planet. A unique testimony of the latest research on new species at Canaima National Park. This area preserves the natural history of fascinating Precambrian outcrops and pristine environments, many of which have never been touched by man.

A must see film!
